sqlMap.statement: SELECT A.EAISEVRINSTNCNAME AS "EAISEVRINSTNCNAME", A.EAISVCNAME AS "EAISVCNAME", A.EXTNLINSTIIDNFINAME AS "EXTNLINSTIIDNFINAME", A.DMNDDTALSBZWKDSTICNAME AS "DMNDDTALSBZWKDSTICNAME", A.PSVSYSADPTRBZWKGROUPNAME AS "PSVSYSADPTRBZWKGROUPNAME", A.ADPTRBZWKNAME AS "ADPTRBZWKNAME", B.EAISVCDESC AS "EAISVCDESC" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIFR07 A RIGHT OUTER JOIN $schemaId$.TSEAIHE01 B ON A.EAISVCNAME = B.EAISVCNAME WHERE A.EAISEVRINSTNCNAME = #eaiSevrInstncName# AND A.EAISVCNAME = #eaiSvcName# AND A.EXTNLINSTIIDNFINAME = #extnlInstiIdnfiName# AND A.DMNDDTALSBZWKDSTICNAME = #dmndDtalsBzwkDsticName# ORDER BY A.EAISVCNAME , A.DMNDDTALSBZWKDSTICNAME
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO $schemaId$.TSEAIFR07 ( EAISEVRINSTNCNAME, EAISVCNAME , EXTNLINSTIIDNFINAME, DMNDDTALSBZWKDSTICNAME, PSVSYSADPTRBZWKGROUPNAME, ADPTRBZWKNAME ) VALUES ( #eaiSevrInstncName#, #eaiSvcName#, #extnlInstiIdnfiName#, #dmndDtalsBzwkDsticName#, #psvSysAdptrBzwkGroupName#, #adptrBzwkName# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE $schemaId$.TSEAIFR07 SET PSVSYSADPTRBZWKGROUPNAME =#psvSysAdptrBzwkGroupName# , ADPTRBZWKNAME =#adptrBzwkName# WHERE EAISEVRINSTNCNAME =#eaiSevrInstncName# AND EAISVCNAME =#eaiSvcName# AND EXTNLINSTIIDNFINAME =#extnlInstiIdnfiName# AND DMNDDTALSBZWKDSTICNAME =#dmndDtalsBzwkDsticName#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIFR07 WHERE EAISEVRINSTNCNAME =#eaiSevrInstncName# AND EAISVCNAME =#eaiSvcName# AND EXTNLINSTIIDNFINAME =#extnlInstiIdnfiName# AND DMNDDTALSBZWKDSTICNAME =#dmndDtalsBzwkDsticName#
